thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jetblue Airways Says Entered Into An Agreement To Implement An Accelerated Share Repurchase Program

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jetblue Airways Says Entered Into An Agreement To Implement An Accelerated Share Repurchase Program
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - Jetblue Airways Corp:
* JETBLUE AIRWAYS SAYS ON MARCH 1, ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT TO IMPLEMENT AN ACCELERATED SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM - SEC FILING
* JETBLUE AIRWAYS - UNDER ASR AGREEMENT, ON MARCH 2, WILL PAY $125 MILLION TO GOLDMAN SACHS & CO. LLC, INITIALLY RECEIVE ABOUT 4.7 MILLION SHARES
* JETBLUE AIRWAYS CORP - ASR PROGRAM IS EXPECTED TO BE COMPLETED BY END OF Q2 OF 2018 AND WILL BE FUNDED WITH CASH ON HAND Source text ( bit.ly/2FcuA6n ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
